de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.api.profile.operations

Interface ProfileRetrievalService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProfileOperations
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl, DFSBasedProfileStorageImplRuntimeDelegatable, ProfileRetrievalServiceImpl, ProfileRetrievalServiceImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public interface ProfileRetrievalService
    User public and private profile data accessor. Describes how users' virtual filesystem is laid out - where he has INBOX, where he has privatespace, where his keystore is located, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserPrivateProfile privateProfile(UserIDAuth ofUser)
      Resolves user's private meta-information like privatespace,keystore, etc.
      UserPublicProfile publicProfile(UserID ofUser)
      Resolves user's public meta-information like INBOX, public keys, etc.
      boolean userExists(UserID ofUser) 

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
        resolved user's profile
